website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful, sturdy, hand-crafted outdoor rug made by company that is conscientious about fair trade.
pros: Rug can easily be transported in included jute carrying bag
7 color options and 6 different sizes to fit most spaces nicely
cons: The rug is not made of fiber
some may be disappointed by this
It is made of recycled, lightweight plastic

customer_reviews.title: Love! But beware furniture feet
customer_reviews.text: Love. This. Mat! We put it on our concrete pool decking with chaise lounges on it. The color is beautiful and it is quite comfortable to walk on barefoot. Only reason for 4 and not 5 stars is that we noticed right away that the chaise lounges' feet were digging into the mat and starting to tear/unravel it. We put broader, softer feet protectors under them so hopefully that damage will cease. Be aware if you plan to place furniture on it.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for FLorida floors!
customer_reviews.text: Most floors are tile here and due to the sand being on your feet from the outside at all times it is hard to keep regular rugs clean (actually almost impossible). These look nice, are soft to walk on, but yet....super easy to keep clean. The vac can easily pull stuff through from beneath and they can be taken outside and hosed off. They dry in a jiffy. The colors look great and so far I have not noticed any fading (mine is inside the house). Update: Have had the rug for almost a year now. It gets a lot of wear and still looks like new. Would buy again and recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Elli Discher

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rug but not for me
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rug but I decided that the colors were a bit too bright so I sadly returned it. The colors actually matched what's in the picture but in the sun it looks more vivid because of the plastic materials it was juuuust a bit too much for me. It felt well made and I think that, with an outdoor rug pad to resist slipping, it would make a lovely addition to a porch or patio. Seems fairly hefty and it arrived in a roll rather than folded so it didn't have the annoying creases that many less expensive woven outdoor rugs do. I'd love to see this in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: ShereKhan0074

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described but light weight and dents.
customer_reviews.text: Product is just as described. Very vibrant, pretty colors, and great material for an outdoor rug with dogs and kids. Easy to keep clean, feels great on your feet and no worries of fading. Down side is its extremely light weight so the wind blows it around every single day. It's also dents where the furniture sits which worries me in regards to longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great..
customer_reviews.text: Looks great ... at first. I have always had a rug on my east side of house patio. It gets morning sun. I love the colors of this rug and it came packaged beautifully with a casing you can store it in when it is not in use. Problem is that it has faded faster than any rug I have every used out there. I bought on from a local big box hardware etc store that never faded but wore out after 3 years of outside use. This rug was expensive enough that it should not have faded in 3 months. Lovely rug colors wish they weren't going away
customer_reviews.author: Teaco

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: NOT SUITABLE FOR OUTDOORS!!
customer_reviews.text: This mat would have been perfect for our outdoor deck IF the promise had been kept. We bought it mid-September, 2019, so within 9 months, the entire thing had to be tossed in the rubbish bin. It disintegrated completely, with rips, tears, and plastic shavings all over the deck. Even though it says there's a one-year warranty, I am not able to return it via Amazon, so I've lost my money, it seems. Poor choice of products. I will not be purchasing anything from this company again, for my indoor OR outdoor living spaces, as beautiful as it was when it arrived. So sad. 😞 😢
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Abate-Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The  "WOW" factor in my tiny "studio" folly.
customer_reviews.text: This bright well-made rug is the highlight in my little "Folly." Which is a "shed" building that has been turned into a tiny 8 X 10 space for me to draw or write/review writers etc etc .. and of course a play space for grandchildren. It is perfect against white walls and jade colored sofa-bed cover. Plus light shades that pick up the lime green and blue in the strips. It is very durable so will wear well. It definitely is the "Focal' point and if you enter my space.. a bit lazy? You will be awakened with a "wow" factor. :D Really love this product. Patricia Hauge
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gillen Hauge

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous porch/deck covering. The colors were incredibly bright and rich. It is so lightweight that it is easily carried with one hand. I love that it also comes with a cover for storage in the winter months. The material is very soft and definitely barefoot approved. My son ordered one the same day I ordered mine, which was weird, but hey, good taste runs in the family. If you are looking for something easy on the feet, colorful and lightweight, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Mc

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY Outdoor Rug I Will Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th rug I have bought like this in different designs. Great colors, super comfortable on bare feet, easy to clean (i hose mine down when something spills on it), and my first one lasted three years before it started to wear down. Mind you I live in Florida with constant hot sun beating down as well as tons of rain. I have two on my outdoor patio which is completely exposed to the elements. I also bought another which fit perfectly on my balcony floor. Highly Recommend these Rugs. And they are made of recycled plastic straws. LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.author: DIANA M.

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this outdoor rug in February of 2018; it's now October of 2019. This summer, it started to fall apart -- the plastic weave coming loose and causing bumps and tripping hazard. Pretty useless now after less than two years. And it doesn't get a lot of traffic -- it's a seating area and most people are off their feet after stepping on it to get the chairs. The break in the weave doesn't appear to correlate with where the chair feet are, either -- it's in random places that don't have the weight of the furniture on them. I will look for a different product to replace this rather than order again.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Wright

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I put this under our dining room table. My dining room is part of the kitchen. The rug gets walked on a lot. I have had it for some time now and it is very durable. Very easy to sweep or vacuum and mop. I chose the teal colors and they are very vibrant. I did put a good carpet liner under the rug so the rug doesn't slide. It's also reversible. I would totally buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, beautiful vibrant color and very durable
customer_reviews.text: the ONLY thing I don't like about this product is the price. I think it is very expensive for what it is. HOWEVER.... it is almost impossible to find these colors and this size for the same product. It looks great in my in the Sunshine state and i've seen no mildew - it covers a floor on my screened in porch and looks great there
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor rug!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rug with some trepidation since I had an outdoor rug that molded and was difficult to clean, but I LOVE this rug! The colors are gorgeous, it's easy to clean, and it's wearing very well. I put it outdoors on our patio, under new furniture that I bought. It's very well made, comes with a nice carry bag (although I can't imagine carrying it anywhere), and I like that it's repurposed materials.
customer_reviews.author: J. Busl

customer_reviews.title: Great rug
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rug for our back porch, which is both the main entrance and a service porch. The rug dresses up the area and looks great. The color is a beautiful turquoise mix. We have another Fab Habitat rug of the same type on the front porch; It's 4 years old and still looks good. I look forward to years of use from this new one as well.
customer_reviews.author: susan b

customer_reviews.title: Love these rugs
customer_reviews.text: Love these rugs! Yes they are plastic but they are woven so that it doesn't have that uncomfortable feeling like if you were walking on a plastic sheet. The colors are vibrant. We chose to use these in our tent while camping and it kept our tent much cleaner, added some extra color, provided a more comfortable feel for our bare feet, in addition to getting us tons of compliments from our friends. I love that this purchase is good for the environment. Little pricier than cheap stuff but worth it. Also, the bags are high quality to protect the rugs while being stored.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter's new house... she has a really nice covered patio and this rug looks fabulous with her pallet made furniture. It's made of plastic so you can actually hose it off if it gets dirty. It looks beautiful. I liked it so much, I ordered another one for our own patio. I love it too! Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Crabb

customer_reviews.title: A great outside rug.
customer_reviews.text: I love this rug and the color. Perfect for out by a pool or to carry camping. My daughter had one and I liked hers so I ordered one. I might get another for the porch. They are plastic and light weight, not soft like a fabric rug but not uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Cheryle’s

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Perfect for the Patio
customer_reviews.text: Matches my outdoor theme on my patio and poolside. Replaced a smaller one I purchased a few years ago that is still in excellent shape. I just need to figure out what to do with it. The colors are brilliant and washes well with a hose. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: AustinTxGal

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive rug, nice colors. Did not dent when I put a stepladder on it. Matches the Pillow Perfect Outdoor Veranda Turquoise Throw Pillows perfectly. Note that this is really a mat instead of a rug. It's made of little plastic tubes, not a fiber with a nap.
customer_reviews.author: Corolla Queen

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color and Easy Care
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and size perfectly fits the screenhouse of my R-Pod travel trailer. Easy to clean mud, dirt and sand. Comes with a great jute (canvas?) carry tube that's tastefully decorated. My only knock is that the material is somewhat fragile in that you have to be careful putting narrow chair or stool or table legs on it as it will puncture the weave.
customer_reviews.author: 4Papa

customer_reviews.title: very light weight - vivid colors
customer_reviews.text: I liked the vivid colors and it is very easy to wash clean. However, it is so light weight that there needs to be something heavy placed on each corner and center to keep it on the patio. I found it was easier to store and just put out when need be. I would not recommend to anyone living in a breezy or windy area. Perhaps good for screened in porch.
customer_reviews.author: dtj7501

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful rug.
customer_reviews.text: I created an outdoor "bistro space with 2 turquoise chairs and a small round table. We making a 6'x9' wood platform to raise the area so the rug is not on dirt. Do not if it is easy to clean or not because we have not used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: WT1950

customer_reviews.title: Feels like plastic but looks great
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an outdoor rug that feels like an indoor rug, this is not the one for you. It does feel like plastic but it makes it easy to spray down to clean. Also my puppy hasn't found any way to pull on a snag and rip the rug apart, because there's basically no cloth here except on the trim.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley W

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I could have saved money and bought a different rug, but these colors really brighten my small space. I’m very happy with this purchase! I will definitely use the bag and straps that were included for winter storage. FYI This was just rolled out in pic and hasn’t had time to flatten yet.
customer_reviews.author: AMorrow

customer_reviews.title: Great for pets
customer_reviews.text: The rug is easy to vacuum and clean. I have it indoors in my living room- I read that indoor/outdoor rugs are easier to clean and wear better when you have several pets. So far, it is true. I had traditional rugs previously. The pet hair would weave itself into the carpet and was difficult to get out. This rug does not have that issue.
customer_reviews.author: JOANNA P.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit hesitant ordering a rug online but I couldn’t find one locally that had the same colors as our camper. This rug looks awesome with our camper and awning, it is sturdy and it comes with its own carrying bag. Super easy to roll up and store.
customer_reviews.author: aCoffeeJunky

customer_reviews.title: Not for indoor use
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item. It looks like raffia, very shiny, and really thin. I was replacing an area rug indoors, and this was far too casual for that use. Bright turquoise - not subtle in any way! I expect this might work nicely on a (covered?) porch, but I think it would need a pad to make it stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Calypsoreid

customer_reviews.title: This rug did not disappoint. It arrived well before promised date
customer_reviews.text: This rug did not disappoint. It arrived well before promised date. The rug was trimmed nicely as to prevent fraying and seems to be heavier than other recycled rugs I’ve had. It came with a very nice storage bag as well. I was only disappointed to find it for half the price online elsewhere the day after it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Robin S

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and simple poolside
customer_reviews.text: Very nice colors! I purchased a larger one for the main seating area Easy to use poolside. Lightweight and easy to move. Each rug comes with a case to pack it up in the winter too. I purchased the pillows and pillow covers from Amazon too and they made my old furniture look so much better.
customer_reviews.author: LML

customer_reviews.title: Colorful Rug for Outdoor Space
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug. I purchased it for an outdoor deck at our beach house. I wanted to protect the deck from the sun's strong rays and add some color to an otherwise brown color scheme. We had our first big rain and the water just ran through the rug, no pooling. It's quick dry so you don't have to worry about water standing on the deck. It's lightweight, so it needs to be anchored down or it will blow away. This rug is under an outdoor dining space so it doesn't have to be anchored. It seems to be very durable and should last for many seasons at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: TX Peanut

customer_reviews.title: its like bamboo, not soft like carpet
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised by the texture of this rug, its like bamboo, not soft like carpet. I hope that makes it durable. I do love the colors. It cost more than i wanted to spend for a splash of color outside on the deck, so i hope it lasts for a few years at least!
customer_reviews.author: Genie

customer_reviews.title: VIBRANT AND BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is exactly what I needed for one of my patio conversation areas. The colors are vibrant, and the touch is nice. Rinse off with a hose and it is as good as new. WAY easy to care for which you need when it it outside. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: hopeful golfer

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had it for long
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the color and it's supple but not thin. It sweeps easy enough but I haven't had it long enough to clean with anything more than a broom for a quick sweep.
customer_reviews.author: katmandu27

customer_reviews.title: Fun colorful patio or sunroom rug!
customer_reviews.text: Great colors. It’s recycled plastic so it is shiny and very durable. An excellent outdoor carpet. Holds up to wet and sun well. Don’t expect a classy looking living room rug folks! It is a awesome patio rug. I got a 9x12 so it looks amazing under my table.
customer_reviews.author: LoriDK

customer_reviews.title: It's almost like a mat you would use at an outdoor party ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not made of regular carpet/rug type material. It's almost like a mat you would use at an outdoor party or dance or whatever. It's got the feel of woven palm leaves, though it's synthetic. The color is gorgeous and it got to me 3 days earlier than originally predicted. Will definitely buy again if I have the need for a colorful rug.
customer_reviews.author: Leah D.

customer_reviews.title: Looks wonderful
customer_reviews.text: We bought this rug to put on our back deck and I must say it was a wonderful fit. The stripes are so colorful and it has held up well. Just rinse it off with the hose and it looks like new again. We had lots of foot traffic and little kids running around on it and the mud and food stains washed off beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Vibrant and functional. Cleans well. Handles full sun without fading. I have had mine for 5 years. The hemmed edge is now wearing, so I will order another.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Colors are just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This was one of my best finds. The colors are vibrant. Matches my colors perfectly. So surprised how nice this rug is.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Dietz-Nord

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor rug! And it's comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this rug! We bought it for an outdoor patio and the colors are really nice! We love that we can just sweep it or leaf blow it to clean it. You'd think it might be uncomfortable to walk on because it's plastic, but instead it's very comfortable to walk and sit on. Even our dogs like to lay on it. It's perfect for our space. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AlyKit

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color
customer_reviews.text: The color of this rug is gorgeous. It's very lightweight and easy to move. I really like it.. i wish the larger one was available. This is the 6x9. The metal patio chairs slide easily without anyone sitting in them.. i wouldn't slide the chair while sitting in it though. I would by it again.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS RUG
customer_reviews.text: i ABSOLUTELY love this rug. The colors are gorgeous, it dries quickly and is easy to clean. I use it on my composite deck on a rubber coated rug mat and no sliding or slipping. I just rolled it up to store it until next summer when I can use it again and already miss the beautiful colors on my deck. Being made of recycled materials is a fantastic plus.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Humbert

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, vibrant colors and very durable. I had one for over a year on my balcony on the beach that gets lots of sun and still looks great. Very easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Ana Tenreiro

customer_reviews.title: Indoor:outdoor rugs
customer_reviews.text: The rug is beautiful and very easy to take care of , however , I have seen similar ones since I purchased this that were less expensive
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rug! So bright and beautiful. Perfect color for my patio. Soft and super easy to clean. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Colors are beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rug to put outside our RV. It is very good quality and can just be hosed off when dirty. It is comes with 3 heavy duty elastic straps and is light weight and easy to store. It also comes with a bag for storage. I could not be more pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: So far, this rug has done well in the Florida rain and sun. The nice thing about it is....it dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: dena

customer_reviews.title: Great rug!
customer_reviews.text: The rug is fully waterproof and is the correct size. The colors are brilliant and bright, just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but durable and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this rug for my porch. Lovely bright colors - heavy duty recycled plastic fibers almost like a wicker texture. Comes well packaged with a cute burlap bag and elastic bands to roll up and tote with. Would be great to use for picnic or under blanket on beach.
customer_reviews.author: cvgirl

customer_reviews.title: Best Outdoor Rug
customer_reviews.text: Dries fast when it rains, Thick and cover for concrete. Feels great under bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Brendaevon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful plastic rug and packaging
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it. It's perfect for a patio, thin and won't absorb rain or moisture. Used the bands to tie back the drapes in the yard as well. It's great colors, just know it is a thin plastic rug.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Marie

customer_reviews.title: I Love this outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: I Love this outdoor rug! We have it on our out door deck off our second floor master bedroom. The deck get lots of sun and is too hot some days to even walk on it. This rug never gets too hot, and it is so comfortable on the feet too. It adds such a beautiful and cool pop of color.Easy to clean. Well priced too.
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had a chance to use this yet on a camping trip, but love the colors and the material. We are looking forward to many outings using this rug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug
customer_reviews.text: This rug is perfect for a screened in porch. It's beautiful and easy to clean. It is also comfortable to walk on barefooted. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Walker

customer_reviews.title: Plastic rug, not at all comfortable to walk on
customer_reviews.text: Hard plastic rug, sure it resists stains but could hardly put my patio table and chairs on it. Plus so uncomfortable to walk on. I didn’t even unwrap it. I could feel it’s texture was rough. Seems to be made of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Appleby

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I actually bought it in 2 different sizes; then, when buying products to help redecorate a room it a friend's apartment, I chose to return and select yet another size in a different color combination! I would definitely feel comfortable recommending to anyone looking to change up the feel of a room!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect rug for my outdoor patio. Looks great under the furniture and just washes clean with the hose. Waiting to see how it holds up through the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Janna U.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We bought two for our patio and they look so nice. Very pricey for the lack of material.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bunnell

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my purchase. This is truly a beautiful area rug! The color is a vibrant teal with other shades or blue. It is durable and easy to clean. It doesn't look cheap and best of all it's eco friendly!! Will definitely be purchasing another one for my backyard patio.
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: This rug is awesome - exceeded expectations. Plus it arrived early and the packaging, well, on a scale of 1 - 5 I would give it an 8! Definitely would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: emjaym

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors, waterproof, definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is made of plastic but it's not hard on your feet, it improved the look of our deck a lot, the kids like to play in it. Water play is not a problem, it dries fast.
customer_reviews.author: Flavia and Donavan

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor carpet!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this item is made from recycled straws. I intend to keep this rug outside and exposed to the elements full time and it is the perfect material. I love it so much that I ordered another in a different pattern for a different part of our pool deck. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Zuroweste

customer_reviews.title: BEST outdoor rug ever
customer_reviews.text: These rugs are the BEST outdoor rugs ever. They do not fade, they are easy to clean, they do not hold water and get moldy, they are soft on bare feet!! I love these rugs and will always buy them!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie L Gaffey

customer_reviews.title: We love our outdoor rug so far
customer_reviews.text: We love our outdoor rug so far! we wanted something to put our outdoor table and chairs on to protect the DG ground. This is a beautiful color and it seems like it will last outside in our extreme temperature changes throughout the year. And I'm thankful that it is made of recycled plastics!
customer_reviews.author: i love futbol

customer_reviews.title: Rug is falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and feel of this rug. This was my second one. The first lasted 4 years with out issue. I've had this one on my deck for 2 months and it is shedding pieces of plastic. We've barely been outside to enjoy it. Not worth the money I spent. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen H Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great colors if you love blues and green.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second rug, same exact one, I gave my first one away and decided to order the same thing. I love the colors and that it is made from recycled items. It makes me think of the Caribbean. I would buy it again. I had the first one for 7 years or so I think.
customer_reviews.author: RichfieldShoppingStar

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Vibrant
customer_reviews.text: This rug really upped my front porch game! The blue/ green colors are so bright and vibrant and the materials is easy to clean. I've honestly just shaken it off. The carrying case is awesome too; will use if I ever move it. I really like that its made of materials that won't get ruined if it gets wet. Very happy with my purchase, I may get one for the back patio as well :)
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Even though I like this rug I still think it's a little over price because it is plastic. Heat can warp this thing so keep it away from fire pits or heaters or anything like that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: this outdoor rug transformed our balcony into an inviting outdoor space. Easy to clean, feels good on bare feet. Would definitely recommend and plan on buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: vibrant
customer_reviews.text: Colors are vibrant and my husband likes the feel of it on his feet. We have it on the back porch that is covered.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie bresnyan

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: This was an important buy for me as we redid our patio this summer. I can’t give it 5 stars for softness but that isn’t a bad thing at all, it’s just the material isn’t made to be soft. It’s gorgeous and durable and the photos really do it no justice, incredibly happy!
customer_reviews.author: sam olson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: So easy to clean. Just wish it would lay more flat but I like it better than the fabric ones.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend! Quick shipment and great quality! Area rug is gorgeous! Perfect for my outdoor patio! Colors are vibrant and rug feels great even barefoot! Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Saf

customer_reviews.title: This item is more like a Matchstick curtain than it is any kind of floor covering.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely an outdoor mat. It is not a rug in any sense of the word.
customer_reviews.author: Kodo

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant
customer_reviews.text: Love this outdoor rug. Colors are vibrant and appears it will be easy to maintain. So new I haven't had to do anything but sweep it. Using on an outdoor patio which is considered a cage in FL. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Rogers

customer_reviews.title: excellent for RV patio or good for totally informal patio ...
customer_reviews.text: Very light and informal, excellent for RV patio or good for totally informal patio or deck usage where you need to have it held down on at least two corners so beeeze doesn't blow it away... lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good rug. Quality seems to be good, and the style is very nice. I haven't had it too long, so I don't know how well it holds up during the rainy season.
customer_reviews.author: Azula

customer_reviews.title: Plastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to really look into the material! It feels like it’s basically recycled plastic, if it’s in the sun watch your feet because it gets really hot in the sun! It’s easy to poke holes in also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful easy to clean mat for patio use
customer_reviews.text: Great little light weight rug that cleans beautifully. It is plasticy...no nap. So it sweeps and nothing sticks to it. Colorful and I imagine I'm in the tropics when I'm on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Great rug and color
customer_reviews.text: This is a great outdoor rug. Easily to clean, sweep, does not hold stains.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for patio!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our gazebo! Pulls in the colors from the chair and daybed cushions and looks awesome. A nice burlap cover comes with it for when we roll it up and store for the winter. More than met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Backyard Bum

customer_reviews.title: Not for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered in May 2019 and it did not last in the sun. Faded ( we flipped it over) and now has unraveled. We take it inside in the winter. Not sure if the warranty will cover this. I do NOT recommend for outdoor use!
customer_reviews.author: Greg B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful  rug
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful rug! I've had so many compliments! Note it us woven material, not a fiber rug, but I have a patio set on it and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Love this rug-mat!
customer_reviews.text: Great mat for inside where there is hardwood or tile and you don't want to put rugs. I like the idea of it being soft on your feet, but non stainable and you can take it outside and hose it off! It's just a good alternative to carpet and rugs and yet you have a break in the hard surface floor beneath it. The colors are wonderful and bright!
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: This rug is fantastic! And to think it's made of straws. :) It's very easy on the feet, keeps the heat at bay on the pool deck, is super easy to clean, AND it looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous out door rug!!
customer_reviews.text: This rug was EXACTLY what this space needed. The very next day it snowed all over the patio!! It literally slipped right up off the rug.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful outdoor rug, the colors are so vibrant, and I love that it's made from recycled plastic! Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: scangirl1066

customer_reviews.title: This rug is the bomb!!! I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This rug is the bomb!!! I have it on the floor of a screened room that does get wet with the wind blowing the rain. It has held up perfectly. Bright and cheerful it livens up the space. Compliments from everyone.
customer_reviews.author: N.D 1227

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for wood deck.
customer_reviews.text: Omg! Absolutely gorgeous. I just stained my deck. I am ready to put the rug down. I am so glad I ordered this recycled rug! I had a outdoor "rug" left behind mildew. Buy plastic not anything else. I bought the 6x9 perfect for my deck. I'm going to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbytanner

customer_reviews.title: Bright!
customer_reviews.text: Just what you’d want for an outdoor rug! We get so many compliments on the colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Morrison

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING!! Love it. It is vibrant and beautiful!! Everything I hoped for!!
customer_reviews.author: SZQ

customer_reviews.title: Color added
customer_reviews.text: Used in screen room to add color. It is the second rug there and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor rug
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and well made outdoor rug. Colors are vibrant. This was a great purchase for me,,
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Love my rug.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this so much I bought another one. My deck looks so pretty. It is soft to walk on and I can hose it off if I need to clean it. I love that it is made from recycled plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect one!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact is easy to clean plus looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Travel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful colors, sturdy and looks great in my spa. it's a plasticy kind of material
customer_reviews.author: Lora Condon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I have it in the backyard with our patio set and it really brightens it up. I ended up ordering a second one from this same brand, but different pattern since I liked this one so much!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Fab Habitat Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My fab habitat Cancun indoor/outdoor rug was delivered on time and packaged very well. I am using it on my deck with our patio furniture. The colors are vibrant and it’s very soft underfoot. I like that at the end of summer it has a burlap tube sleeve to store it in. I would not hesitate to purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Anne Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully light and easy to move. The colors are a bit brighter than I thought from the picture. A smidgen more plastic-y than I'd hoped but it feels good to walk on it barefoot.
customer_reviews.author: sm

customer_reviews.title: Great rug
customer_reviews.text: This rug is beautiful - love the colors! It's soft under your feet and easy to keep clean. It can be rolled up and stored in its own bag. We have received many compliments on it and are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Brock

customer_reviews.title: Pleasing to the eye. Looks better than picture on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I have it in my office on top of white stained carpet. Looks nice and gives my light blue office some real pop. It is plastic so we will see how it works over long haul on carpeting. Planning on buying one now for deck.
customer_reviews.author: justhinkin

product_meta.title: Fab Habitat Reversible Rugs | Indoor or Outdoor Use | Stain Resistant, Easy to Clean Weather Resistant Floor Mats | Cancun - Turquoise & Moss Green, 6' x 9'
product_meta.description: Size:6' x 9'| Color:Cancun - Turquoise & Moss GreenThe classic striped pattern of the Cancun rug makes it easy to incorporate into any room, while the array of vibrant hues makes it a best seller. The multicolored straws are carefully blended together to create a unique pattern every time. These beautifully crafted rugs are made following the fair trade principles. Fab Rugs add a touch of elegance to your home decor. They are made using premium quality recycled plastic straws which are tightly woven together to offer strength, softness and beauty. Being plastic, moisture will have no effect on the mat and it will not attract mildew.
feature_bullets: 100% RECYCLED PREMIUM PLASTIC our eco-friendly rugs are tightly woven, for added durability, from straws made up of recycled plastic. Strong and hard-wearing but soft and comfortable underfoot. The power loomed threads are woven with skill and precision. Actual colors and size may vary from the image(s) shown due to manufacturing limitations.

MOLD & MILDEW RESISTANT, UV RESISTANT TO PREVENT FADING and sun damage, these multi-functional rugs won’t cause damage to your lawn or decking. They are also practical for indoor use, spills will just wipe clean. Comes with a one year warranty. Easy to take care of, just shake or hose off for easy cleaning. The manufacturer recommends using a non-skid pad beneath the rug (pad not included).

REVERSIBLE, INDOOR/OUTDOOR USE our rugs are constructed to withstand the outdoor elements all year round. Equally they will be right at home in the interior of your home, with many versatile designs to choose from. These rugs are reversible allowing you to have two different looks in a matter of seconds.
ECO-FRIENDLY CARRIER BAG with shoulder strap included, making the rug portable and easy to transport for beach trips, camping or picnics. Bag not included with 2.5ft, 3ft, 8ft & 9ft rugs.
GOODWEAVE CERTIFIED our rugs are made by adult hands, never those of children, we partner with Goodweave to certify our rugs are child-labor-free.
